description:
You spoke, and we listened! Now Amarillo National Bank is Absolutely Anywhere! ANB’s powerful and completely new Mobile Banking app puts the ability to access your account, check balances, pay bills, transfer funds, and find branch and ATM locations as close as your iPhone. It’s convenient, secure, and available 24/7.

FEATURES:
• Monitor account balances 
• Review transaction history
• Transfer funds
• Pay bills**
• Find nearby ATMs and branch locations

SECURITY:
Our mobile banking safeguards your accounts using the same advanced encryption and verification technology as ANB’s Online Banking, protecting your personal information.

To get started simply log into your ANB Online Banking and enroll in Mobile Banking.

*Must be enrolled in ANB Online Banking
**Must have Bill Pay setup previously in Online Banking
***ANB Mobile Banking is free to download, although messaging and data rates from your wireless provider may apply.
releaseNotes:
- Updated application to support iOS8
            - Fixes made to address minor bugs
